title: Matías Osadczuk
text:
Matías Osadczuk (born 22 April 1997) is an Argentine <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player.
Career.
He tore a knee ligament against Australia at the <a href="2017%20Hong%20Kong%20Sevens">2017 Hong Kong Sevens</a> tournament and required surgery before he returned to competitive action at the <a href="2018%20Sydney%20Sevens">2018 Sydney Sevens</a> tournament. He won gold at the <a href="Rugby%20sevens%20at%20the%202019%20Pan%20American%20Games">2019 Pan American Games</a> in <a href="Lima%2C%20Peru">Lima, Peru</a>. He was named in the <a href="Rugby%20sevens%20at%20the%202020%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Men%27s%20team%20squads">Argentina squad</a> for the <a href="Rugby%20sevens%20at%20the%202020%20Summer%20Olympics">Rugby sevens at the 2020 Summer Olympics</a>.
